mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.project_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.district, u.street , u.community, u.hamlet, CONCAT_WS('',a.dict_label,b.dict_label,c.dict_label,d.dict_label) as area_name, a.dict_label as district_name, b.dict_label as street_name, c.dict_label as community_name, d.dict_label as hamlet_name from sys_user u left join sys_dict_data a on (u.district = a.dict_value and a.dict_type='district' and a.project_id = u.project_id) left join sys_dict_data b on (u.street = b.dict_value and b.dict_type='street' and b.project_id = u.project_id) left join sys_dict_data c on (u.community = c.dict_value and c.dict_type='community' and c.project_id = u.project_id) left join sys_dict_data d on (u.hamlet = d.dict_value and d.dict_type='hamlet' and d.project_id = u.project_id) where u.user_type = '03' and u.user_id = #{userId}
